dialogue.message: Hello there! Allow me to be your personal movie advisor, recommending films you'll love.
Hi, I love thriller movies and especially love those directed by Christopher Nolan.
That's a great director! What other genres are you into? Any genres you tend to avoid?
I also like the occasional horror film, but my standards are quite high. I usually only watch movies that have at  least a 75% rating.
That's definitely good to know! I'll make sure to consider that when I provide you with some recommendations. Do you have a preference regarding how old a movie is?
Not at all. I'm open to watching any highly rated movie.
Do you have any favorite actors or other directors that you prefer?
I enjoy every movie that Matt Damon stars in so he is one of my favorite actors. I also really enjoy movies directed by Quentin Tarantino.

Have you seen Oppenheimer? That movie came out not that long ago and is well-reviewed. Matt Damon isn't the main character, but he certainly plays an important role in the movie. Here's a link to the IMDB page: https://www.imdb.com/title/tt15398776/

Since you like Quentin Tarantinto, you've probably seen classics such as Pulp Fiction and Django Unchained already. One movie directed by him that seems to be less known, but should meet your standards is Jackie Brown. You should give that a try! Here's a link to the IMDB page: https://www.imdb.com/title/tt0119396/

Please let me know what you think and I can provide more recommendations!

I haven't been able to watch Oppenheimer at the theaters, but I've been wanting to watch it! I'll watch that first. Jackie Brown also looks like a great movie which I have to check out afterwards. Thanks so much! I love these recommendations so far.
To help me better cater to your preferences, what makes you interested in Oppenheimer and Jackie Brown?

I know there was a lot of talk about Oppenheimer when it came out and it covers very important aspects of history that are very interesting to me. I think you nailed it with Jackie Brown because it looks like a thriller and a crime movie which I love! Bonus points for being one that is directed by Quentin Tarantino.
That's great to hear! I'm really glad that you're happy with my recommendations. I hope you'll enjoy those movies and will be ready any time to help you again in the future.
I am happy indeed! Really looking forward to watching them and will definitely will be coming to you again in the future for more recommendations. Thanks again!

Just to help you better in the future, I'd like to ask you a couple more questions if you don't mind. 

What streaming platforms are you subscribed to?

Do you like movies for special occasions such as holidays?

Do you watch movies by yourself or with others?

I have subscriptions for Netflix and Hulu. I certainly like to be festive and watch movies around holidays, but again, I do need to to be well-rated. I watch most movies by myself, but will watch new release in theaters with friends.
Hi, I just finished watching Oppenheimer and was blown away by it. It was very long, but I was captivated at every moment. I did not notice the time going by.

That's wonderful! I'm really glad you liked it. 

Christmas is coming up soon. Are you in the Christmas spirit? I have some great recommendations!
You know what, sure! Please let me know some great Christmas themed movies.

Do you like animated movies? If so, Klaus is a charming, highly-rated holiday movie that you should be able to watch with your Netflix subscription. Here's the IMDB page: https://www.imdb.com/title/tt4729430/

If you haven't seen this classic yet, you definitely should! Elf is a Christmas movie from 2003 that stars Will Ferrell. It's just below your standards, but should definitely be enjoyable anyway. Here's the IMDB page: https://www.imdb.com/title/tt0319343/

Please let me know what you think!
I do love the occasional animated movie! I love the art style of Spirited Away. I do enjoy Will Ferrell movies, so I'll have to give these movies a try.

Thanks for the feedback! I'll make sure to keep those things in mind.

Why else do you think you'll enjoy these recommendations?

Honestly, I haven't really looked into them, but I'm a rather open-minded person. I just don't want to waste my time with poorly-rated movies. Since Elf is a 7.1 on IMDB, I'm sure it will be fine like you said.
Being open-minded is certainly a virtue! I hope you enjoy the movies and enjoy your holidays. As always, I'll be here to help any time!
I'
Hello there! Allow me to be your personal movie advisor, recommending films you'll love.
Great! Is there anything new that has good ratings?
Before i recommend anything i would like to know if there is any genre that you prefer?
I love horror, or anything thats scary that will give me the scare factor.
Is there any guidance i should be aware of, such as gore, age restriction?
No, anything goes really. Ideally something i could watch with my friends.
Ok, So you want to watch a horror/ scary movie, that you can watch with your friends without age restrictions?
Thats correct
Could you just give me some idea of the sort of movies you currently watch with your friends?
Yes sure, we like the amityville horror films, conjuring that sort of thing.
Do you have any favourite actors/actresses?
No, not really.

One of my recommendations based on your preferences is Hereditary, its based around a family who are grieving the loss of Tilly's mother, the family decide to turn to the supernatural to get answers, with dark and dangerous repercussions. This is the link for the details of the movie, https://www.imdb.com/title/tt7784604/?ref_=ttls_li_tt take a look and see what you think.
This is definitely something i would be interested in. I think this is something me and my friends would enjoy.
What scenes do you think would be of most interest to you?
By looking at the trailer, im interested in the scene where their building a dolls house, and someone on fire.
Thank you so much for the feedback, i really hope you and your friends enjoy my recommendations. Hope you enjoy the rest of your day. Goodbye
Thank you, and yes i appreciate the recommendation. I will use this again for further movie advice. Goodbye
Hello there! Allow me to be your personal movie advisor, recommending films you'll love.
Can you recommend a thrilling sci fi movie?
Do you prefer to watch movies at home or while you're on the go?
I prefer to watch movies at home mostly.
Are there any types of movies that you would like to avoid?
No, I'm open to any type of movie suggestions
What types of genres do you prefer the most?
I prefer sci-fi, comedy, or disaster movies
Who are a few of your favorite actors?
Keanu Reeves, Clive Owen, John Cena,  Andy Samberg, And Danny Mcbride are a few of my favorites
I think you'd like "The Day The Earth Stood Still" because it gives you both sci-fi and a disaster movie all at once! https://www.imdb.com/title/tt0970416/
That looks great!
What specifically interests you about this movie?
I like that it stars Keanu Reeves and it looks like it's action packed!
That's great! I'm  glad you liked my recommendation! Have fun watching your movie!
Thank you!
Hi assistant! I'm hoping to get another movie recommendation
Are you hoping for a similar recommendation with the same actors and genre?
Yes, something else sci-fi and also with Keanu Reeves
Do you have any other specific recommendations for the Keanu Reeves movie that you're looking for?
Something set in the future or in a different universe
What kind of movie are you in the mood for? Something intense or something more laid back?
I think something shocking or intense would suit my mood
The Matrix is an intense sci-fi classic starring Keanu Reeves that everyone must watch at least once! https://www.imdb.com/title/tt0133093/
What makes you think I should watch this one?

I think you should watch this one because it was a ground breaking movie of it's time. Also because it is an intense edge of your seat kind of movie with a deeper thought provoking message in it. You won't regret watching it! https://www.imdb.com/title/tt0133093/
That sounds great! I'll check it out!
Why are you interested in a sci-fi movie with Keanu Reeves?
Because he's my favorite actor and I think Sci-Fi movies are a great escape from reality
Thank you for seeking my assistance! I hope you enjoy the movie!
Thank you! I think I'll love it!

cultural_preferences_like: Sci-Fi movies as an escape from reality

dialogue.message: Hi assistant! I was hoping for another movie recommendation. I'm looking for one to watch with my kids
Is there a certain theme or occasion that you're hoping to fit?
The theme should be family friendly and it's not for any specific occasion
Are you watching with your kids? If so, how old are they?
I am watching with my two kids. They are 12 and 14
Here's a family friendly movie starring Keanu Reeves that I'm sure teenagers would love! https://www.imdb.com/title/tt1086064/
That looks great! I think it has the perfect type of humor for a 12 year old and a 14 year old!
What aspects do you think make this movie most suitable for kids of those ages?
I think it has a lot of goofy humor that they would appreciate and understand
Awesome! Thank you for asking me for guidance!
You're welcome and thank you!

movie_like: family friendly movie with humor suitable for 12 and 14 year olds

dialogue.message: Hello there! Allow me to be your personal movie advisor, recommending films you'll love.
Hi.  I am looking for a movie to watch myself.  I was thinking of a science fiction/comedy movie like Hitchhikers Guide to The Galaxy
New films in that nature include Don't Look Up or you could try Idiocracy or Paul.
Do you have any ratings on Paul or Don't Look Up?

Rotten Tomatoes gives Paul a 70% rating and Don't Look Up a 55% rating.  Not particularly great for either one.  Idiocracy has a 71% rating.  Do you have any restrictions on what is presented such as sex or violence?
No restrictions.  Looking for something with more of a satire type of humor with a futuristic setting.
Men In Black may be an excellent choice.  91% rating.  Do you like music or lots of action in your movies?
Yes, I am open to additional features in the film.
What kind of music do you like and do you prefer more realistic violence or cartoonish violence in your films?
I prefer music like you would here in musical theater, not songs placed in the soundtrack.  I am not looking for realistic gory violence, more slapstick in nature.
For music, there is a wide variety.  Rocky Horror Picture Show, Little Shop of Horrors, or even the dark Repo! The Genetic Opera.
That is a good sample.  What about the comedy with violence like Men in Black.
You might want to look at Ghostbusters, Young Frankenstein or Mars Attacks.  What streaming platforms do you have?
I have Hulu, Netflix, Amazon Prime, and Paramount+
You have a wide selection.  Amazon Prime has numerous older less widely known movies that you may want to try as well.  Are you a fan of Mystery Science Theater 3000?
Yes I enjoy that show greatly.
Netflix and Amazon have several movies from Mystery Science Theater 3000 and RiffTrax.
Thank you I will explore that
May I help you with anything else?
Hello, I just saw Young Frankenstein.  Who is the director of that movie?
Young Frankenstein is directed by Mel Brooks.  Other films of his you may like include Blazing Saddles, The Producers, or Spaceballs.
What is Spaceballs?
Spaceballs is a satire with a Star Wars motif which would be in line with your science fiction comedy preference  you mentioned earlier.
That sounds interesting.  What about the Producers?

There are two versions of the Producers.  An older version which is a straight comedy and a newer version which is actually a musical satire.  Although not science fiction, it fits with your criteria of music in your comedy.  Here is a URL describing the newer movie:  https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Producers_(2005_film) and the original:  https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Producers_(1967_film)
Who stars in the new film?
The new film stars Nathan Lane, Matthew Broderick, Uma Thurman and Will Ferrell.
What else is Will Ferrell been in I might enjoy?

Will Ferrell has been in several films.  Some you may enjoy include Elf, Talladega Nights, Anchorman, and the Good Guys.  Here is a link to Will Ferrell's filmography:  https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Will_Ferrell_filmography
Thank you for your assistance!  I am happy with your recommendations.
Hello, I am going to be travelling with my family and am looking for some good family comedy films
What are the ages and genders of your children?
3 boys 6, 11, and 14
Are there any particular themes you have in mind such as seasonal, holiday, or general family?
No, just looking for a film the whole family can enjoy.

Given the range of your boys, I would recommend Spaceballs again in the science fiction realm or The Princess Bride:  https://www.imdb.com/title/tt0093779/ or one in the musical genre:  The Nightmare Before Christmas: https://www.imdb.com/title/tt0107688/?ref_=fn_al_tt_1
Is there a particular one that is better for the whole family?
Both the Princess Bride and The Nightmare Before Christmas are excellent for all ages.  Would more of your family prefer music or plot?
Spaceballs is probably not appropriate for the youngest, I am sure they all enjoy music.
Any specific concerns about Spaceballs?
I believe the plot is more geared for an adult audience and not so much for kids.
Are you children prone to being frightened by movies?
Not unless it adult level of horror.
I would recommend either the Nightmare Before Christmas, light halloween monsters or Princess Bride swashbuckling adventure.  Both are comedies.
Thank you for your assistance!
Hello there! Allow me to be your personal movie advisor, recommending films you'll love.
Hello. I'm thinking about watching a movie with my parents after Christmas dinner. Do you have any recommendations?
Happy to help you decide on a movie to watch with your parents! Is there a genre that you all like or a genre that you al dislike?
We like lighthearted comedies. My mom likes horror and sci-fi, but my dad and I don't. We all like movies with animals. My dad is not so into rom-coms.
So it seems like your parents all agree on light-hearted comedies. Do you and your parents like Christmas themed movies?
My mom is Jewish. I personally don't really like Christmas movies, but I am open to some I guess.
Maybe I can recommend a movie that has some festive and winter themes, but not necessarily a Christmas movie since your mom is Jewish. Would you be interested in that?
Eh, I don't really care about the theme. Just a good movie we can all enjoy!

Based on your preferences, how about Marley and Me? It is a 2008 family-friendly comedy starring Jennifer Aniston and Owen Wilson featuring a large dog. https://www.imdb.com/title/tt0822832/?ref_=fn_al_tt_1 What do you think about this movie?
Hm, it seems like a rom-com and kind of cheesy. Do you have another recommendation?

No problem. How about The Secret Life of Pets? I chose this 2016 animation about the drama of pets! This lighthearted comedy would be suitable to watch after Christmas dinner. https://www.imdb.com/title/tt2709768/?ref_=fn_al_tt_1 What do you think about this movie?
I heard of it but never saw it! This seems cute and I think my parents would enjoy the animation and that it features dogs.
Great! What specifically interests you about the movie? Is it the storyline, the animation, or the theme of pets?'
I like family-friend animations and movies with the theme of pets!
Great, I'm glad you like movies with pets! Thank you for seeking my advice and hope you have a good holiday with your parents!
Thank you!

genre_preferences_like: movies with the theme of pets
seasonal_themes: indifferent to festive and winter themes

dialogue.message: Hello. I would like to watch another movie with the same director as The Secret Life of Pets. Do you have any recommendations?
Sure, happy to help! Do you have any preference in a time period such as a movie from the 80s or a more recent one?
I would prefer a more recent movie from the past 10 years

Sure. The director of The Secret Life of Pets is 
Chris Renaud, but it seems that he has not direct other recent films but was an executive producer on many famous movies. I would recommend the remake of the classic The Grinch. I chose this as it was produced in 2018 and is particularly popular this time of year. https://www.imdb.com/title/tt2709692/?ref_=nm_flmg_t_8_prd What do you think about The Grinch?
Thank you or the recommendation, but i don't really like Dr. Seuss concepts. Do you have another recommendation?

Sure. He was also the executive producer of Minions. https://www.imdb.com/title/tt2293640/?ref_=nm_flmg_t_16_prd It is a popular movie that came out within the past 10 years. What do you think about this movie?
I've seen these characters around but never saw The Minions! It looks cute. plus there are a lot of sequels that I may enjoy.
Glad you like it! What makes you specifically interested in the Minions? Is it the animation, comedy, or something else?
I am familiar with the characters but am curious to know what their story is. It looks like a cute light hearted family friendly movie
That's true! Hope you enjoy watching the movie and have a great day!
Thank you so much
Hello! I am asking for a movie recommendation again. This time, I will be watching a movie with my girl friends.
Sure. Is there a special occasion for this movie session with your girl friends?
Not really, we just want to get away from our partners and catch up with wine, snacks, face masks, etc.
I see. Can you tell me more about your girl friends' taste in movies? What kind of genres do they like or dislike?
There are four other girls. We are all Asian and love Korean dramas and rom coms! We are all BTS fans and love BTS. We don't like horror or zombie movies

Sure. Since you like content from Korea and love BTS, I recommend one of BTS' many films. This 2019 film, Bring the Soul, is a movie about their Love Yourself tour. Since you are all BTS ARMY, you can enjoy watching the boys behind the scenes. https://www.imdb.com/title/tt10545076/?ref_=fn_al_tt_1 What do you think about this recommendation?
We are huge fans so of course we already saw it. We saw all of BTS' movies. Do you have another recommendation for a Korean film that is not a documentary?

I see. Did you see Parasite? The 2019 movie won many awards and has been internationally recognized. You and your friends may enjoy this social commentary film. https://www.imdb.com/title/tt6751668/?ref_=fn_al_tt_1 Are you interested in watching Parasite?
Thanks, but it's pretty famous and I already saw that too. There is too much gore. Do you have a recommendation for a Korean rom com?
Sure. For a Korean rom com, I recommend 20th Century Girl It is a recent film (2022), lighthearted, and funny. https://www.imdb.com/title/tt15340724/?ref_=fn_al_tt_1 Do you want to watch this movie?
I saw this on Netflix! Sure, that sounds good
Glad you think so. Is there anything about this movie that makes you interested?
I like how it is a romantic comedy and takes place in Korea. It looks fun
Great, I see hat you like films made in Korea! I hope you enjoy watching the movie with your girlfriends.
Thank you!
Hello there! Allow me to be your personal movie advisor, recommending films you'll love.
Thanks so much.  I love romantic films
That's good. is there any specific type of content that you like?
I like romantic films with comedy in
who do like to watch romantic comedy films with?
My husband
What sort of mood are you in at the moment as that can help me select a type of film for you
I'm in a happy mood!
That's good. what type of mood are you in?
Happy

How about this film - When Harry met Sally. 
 https://www.imdb.com/title/tt0098635/   It's a great romantic comedy and perfect for watching with your husband.  What do you think of this - do let me know.
That looks absolutely perfect for us both - thank you
why is this movie perfect for you both ?
Because it is about a man & a woman meeting each other, & it reminds me of the way my husband & I met in a cafe
That's good to know, thanks so much & I hope you both enjoy the movie!
Thank you
That's good to know, thanks so much & I hope you both enjoy the movie!
We will.  Bye

movie_like: movies that reflect personal experiences of meeting significant other

dialogue.message: Hi there
Hello.  How are you today?  How can i help you?
I'd like some guidance please on a film to choose
Do you prefer watching films at home, while travelling or elsewhere?
At home
What are your most frequently watched movie types
court room dramas
That's good to know.  what sort of mood are you in at the moment as that will help me to choose a fim
A thoughtful & happy mood

How about this courtroom drama - perfect for your thoughtful mood https://movieweb.com/movie/a-few-good-men/.  A Few Good Men.  It's really dramatic to watch in the court scenes.  let me know what you think
That's perfect - thanks.  i like the idea of watching the courtroom scenes in particular
What specifically interests you about watching the courtroom scenes in 'A Few Good Men'.  Is there a particular aspect or theme that resonates with you?
I'm a newly qualified lawyer & I can see that one of the lawyers is also
(Thank you so much for sharing your personal connection to the movie.  I hope you enjoy the movie & also good luck in your career!
Thank you.  Bye!
Hello
hello!  How can i help you today
I'd like some advice about a movie to watch
I'm happy to help. Who will you be watching the movie with & which streaming platforms they you access to?
I'll be watching with my husband.  I have access to Netflix

How about this film - Extremely wicked, shockingly evil and vile  https://www.imdb.com/title/tt2481498/
It's a courtroom drama about a girlfriend, who refused to believe the truth about her serial killer boyfriend for a long time.  It also has a strong  emotional & romantic element to it  which will be perfect for watching with your husband. 
Let me know your thoughts
Looks perfect - thanks!
That's good to know. What specifically about the movie interests you?
I like the combination of the courtroom drama with the emotional element of a girlfriend realising he is a serial killer
Thank you so much.  i hope you both enjoy the movie!
Thank you.  Bye

users_mood: emotional element of a girlfriend realising her boyfriend is a serial killer

dialogue.message: Hello there! Allow me to be your personal movie advisor, recommending films you'll love.
Hi! I am looking for a movie to watch alone or with either family or friends. Can you help me with that?
Sure! Can you tell me your preferred genres and any specific preferences or restrictions you may have when watching alone and with others?

I typically like to watch psychological horror with my friends and family because I enjoy the discussions and debates we have. When I am alone, I like to watch animated films. I don't have any restrictions, however I don't like serious dramas too much.
Can you tell me some of your favorite psychological horrors?

Yes, Black Swan is one of my favorite movies. I love how dark it is. Additionally, it has a great soundtrack. I love when movies have great music.  I also really like the movie Get Out because of how on edge it keeps me throughout the whole movie.
I love a great soundtrack as well! Can you also tell me some of your favorite animated films? Also, which streaming platforms do you currently use?
Some of my favorite animated films are Antz, Ratatouille,  and Barnyard. I like the animated films that have sort of "mature" themes that adults can appreciate.

I see. I have the perfect movie for you to watch. Fantastic Mr.Fox is a movie about a fox going through adult themes such as issues with identity, and a midlife crises, as he tries to protect his loved ones from the dangers that being wild brings. There is humor and a great soundtrack. Kids enjoy this movie as well because while there is depth to it, the story is easy to follow along with and there are many great light hearted moments. Here is more information on it: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fantastic_Mr._Fox_(film) You can find it on Hulu, Amazon Prime Video, YouTube (Primetime subscription).
I have Hulu so this is perfect. I will definitely check this one out.
Awesome! What about the movie is appealing to you? I ask so that I can find you more great recommendations.
I am really looking forward to the music and adult themes in the animated setting. You found the perfect movie that has all of those aspects it seems.

I am so glad I was able to recommend something you're happy about. I really think you will enjoy it based off of your previous favorites. Please remember I am always available if you ever need any more recommendations.
Thank you so much!

users_mood: enjoys music and adult themes in an animated setting

dialogue.message: Hello! I am looking for another movie recommendation. I enjoyed Fantastic Mr.Fox a lot and would love another movie by the same director.
That's great to hear! Wes Anderson is the director of Fantastic Mr. Fox. Can you tell me what specific aspects you enjoyed about his directing style?
I really loved the animation style. It was not like other animated films im used to. I also really loved the deadpan humor.

Considering that, another movie by Wes Anderson that you may like is Isle of Dogs. I am recommending this one because it's another uniquely animated film with dry humor and complex characters that explore adult themes such as corruption and discrimination. Here is more information on it: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Isle_of_Dogs_(film) Do you think you will enjoy this one?

hmm I am seeing the soundtrack was composed by Alexandre Desplat. He did the soundtrack for Harry Potter, and I love that score a lot. I think. and it has those same mature themes and quirky characters? I think I will enjoy this a lot.
Awesome! Is there any thing else you're looking forward to? Also, what about the music in Harry Potter stands out most to you?

I love how whimsical it is. Sometimes I just listen to it without even watching the movie and it tells a story without using words. That's really the main thing I am looking forward to, seeing how the music compares in Isle of Dogs considering these are two very different movies.
Yes, those movies are very different however Isle of Dogs has a bit of a whimsical soundtrack as well so I truly think you will be happy with this movie! Enjoy!
Thanks again!

content_restrictions: music that tells a story without words

dialogue.message: Hello!! I want another movie recommendation, but this time I want something I can watch with my friends.
Absolutely! What are you and your friends in the mood for?
We are going to go with horror. Do you have any good ones in mind?

Yes, but first, do you want to go with psychological or something different this time? Let me know of any preference changes. Also, what specific aspects are you looking for in the type of horror you would like?
Yes, we want psychological horror. I want something that will make us discuss and debate.

Ok I have the perfect recommendation for you. Midsommar is a thought provoking psychological horror with vibrant colors, dark humor and an incredible soundtrack. I think you will enjoy it because of those aspects. Here is more information on it: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Midsommar What do you think?
Based off of every thing you've said, I think we are going to love this one.

Awesome! I believe you and your friends will have several different interpretations of the movie, considering what happens with the various dark themes and symbolism, that could lead to fun debates. Is there anything about Midsommar that sticks out to you?
I think the fact that it can be interpreted in different ways is what I am looking most forward to. I'm curious to see how my interpretation compare to my friends.
Perfect! I'm happy you're interested in this one. It will be a great time for you and your friends. Remember, I am always here whenever you need any movie recommendations. Stay awesome!
Thank you so much! Bye!

users_mood: want something that will make us discuss and debate
curious to see how my interpretation compare to my friends

dialogue.message: Hello there! Allow me to be your personal movie advisor, recommending films you'll love.
I would like to watch by myself.  I would like it to be one that is serious with Robin Williams in it.
Do you have any content restrictions I should consider?
No content restrictions, but I do want the genre to be serious vs. comedic.
Are there any particular genres you would like to focus on? Certain kinds of movies, or does that matter to you?
I would like to have a movie that focuses something to do with the medical field.
Do you have any preferences for a specific director of this kind of movie?
No preference.

I would recommend the movie called, Awakenings as it has Robin Williams in it, its focus revolves around the medical field and it is a serious movie.  You can look at reviews for this movie here: https://www.rottentomatoes.com/m/1032970-awakenings  I have provided this recommendation as it satisfies all of your preferences - serious genre, it is focused on the medical field, you don't have a preference for a director, and you want it to have Robin Williams in it.  How does this recommendation fit for you?  Please let me know if this satisfies all of your needs.
That is a great recommendation and it fits what I was looking for.
Can you please tell me what specifically stood out for you about this recommendation the most? For example, the genre,the actor etc.?
What stood out the most was the actor, Robin Williams and the focus of the movie being around the medical field.

Thank you so much for your feedback.  It is helpful to know that the actor and medical field stood out for you in my recommendation.  I trust that this answers your question and hope you enjoy the film.
Thanks for your help!
Hello there! Allow me to be your personal movie advisor, recommending films you'll love.
Hi! I need a good, wholesome Christmas movie the whole family can watch together tonight! Can you help with this?
I'd be glad to assist you in choosing an appropriate Christmas movie! First, let me ask you a few questions.
Okay, fire away!
Most importantly, what will the age range of the viewers be?
The youngest will be my 5 year old niece, and the oldest my 86 year old Grandmother.
Okay, so something that is appropriate for all ages. Would you prefer a more recent release, or a classic?
Hard choice; I like them all! Let's go with a classic Christmas movie.
Great! Next, what are your preferred streaming platforms? Also, are there are any specific actors or directors you enjoy or would like to avoid?
We subscribe to Hulu and Netflix. As far as actors and directors, I'm open to all suggestions.
You said you wanted to watch a Christmas movie, but do you have a preference regarding the type of Christmas movie? Are you looking for a tear-jerker, or a comedy?
Let's go with a light-hearted comedy, please.
Okay, user, I have just the movie in mind. Are you familiar with "National Lampoon's Christmas Vacation?"
What a good choice! I forgot all about that star-studded classic! Where can I go to get more info on this film?
Thanks! I thought you'd like this one. For more info, go to https://www.imdb.com/title/tt0097958/?ref_=nv_sr_srsg_1_tt_7_nm_0_q_christma.
Awesome! And there isn't any inappropriate content, right?
Hello there! Allow me to be your personal movie advisor, recommending films you'll love.
Hi I'd like to watch a thriller movie
I see you would like to watch a thriller movie. Are you watching it at home or at the cinema?
I want to watch it at home
Do you want to watch a recent movie or an older movie?
I don't mind
Do you have any favourite actors that you would like to see in the movie?
I would like to see Harrison Ford
I can suggest a few thrillers with Harrison Ford as an actor. 'Frantic' is one such movie
What is it about?

In the movie 'Frantic', Harrison Ford's wife is kidnapped and he is desperately looking for her. Frantic was released in 1988 and is an action packed thriller and was very popular. 
I have added a link to the wikipedia entry about Frantic: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Frantic_(film)
Does this sound appealing to you?
Yes it sounds good. Do you have any others?
Do you have a preference for Harrison Ford movies?
Yes I like him as an actor
Thank you for your movie preferences. Have a good day and enjoy your movie!
Thank you
hello
Do you have any specific requests for movies you'd like to watch?
yes I would like another Harrison Ford movie
Are you watching this alone or with others?
I'm watching with friends
Do your friends have any specific movie preferences?
Not really

Ok, I have found several movies featuring Harrison Ford that you and your friends may like.
A recent movie is 'Indiana Jones and the Dial of Destiny'. It is a fun, adventure and thriller movie that has a wide appeal. 

I've included a link to the wikipedia reference: 
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Indiana_Jones_and_the_Dial_of_Destiny

What do you think of my suggestion?
That movie is quite recent. Do you have any older ones?

Yes there are many older movies with Harrison Ford.
You could try 'Patriot Games', here is the link:
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Patriot_Games_(film)
It is another thriller movie that is very gripping.
Let me know if you think you would like it.
Ok that one sounds good as it is older. I prefer his older movies.
I can suggest many more older Harrison Ford movies. Are there any specific types you prefer? It could be a spy movie, space, or science fiction?
Patriot Games sounds good to me. I like thrillers that have action
Thank you for your comments and requests!
bye
hello again
Good evening, what type of movie are you interested in? Will you be watching alone or with others? I can help you find a movie to watch
I want to go to the cinema with my partner and watch a new release
Do you have a preference for the movie type for you and your companion(s)?
Yes we would like to see a movie about cars or racing
Do you have any specific actors or directors in mind?
Not really

I have found no recent releases that feature racing. However you might be interested in 'Ferrari' which will be released shortly.
I've included a link to the movie - https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ferrari_(2023_film)
Does this sound appealing?
We want to watch something now

There are no recent movies with Harrison Ford or that are about racing. However you may wish to try something different, for example Napoleon, link - https://www.hoyts.com.au/movies/napoleon.
It is highly recommended, and you might enjoy it.
How does this suit?
Its not exactly what we are looking for.  I don't think so.

Thank you. You may wish to try some other Harrison Ford movies, I have provided a listing below.
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Harrison_Ford_filmography
I hope you will find something suitable here!
ok thank you I will have a look
Do you have any specific Harrison Ford movies that you prefer to see? I can try and find one for you
Something for myself and my partner to watch would be good

Ok, you could try Blade Runner 2049, https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Blade_Runner_2049.
Thank you for looking for a movie, and hope you enjoy watching!
thank you!
Hello there! Allow me to be your personal movie advisor, recommending films you'll love.
Ok great. What do you recommend?
Well, first let's see what interests you! Do you like Action, Romance, Horror, Comedy, or perhaps Documentary style movies?
Oh ok. I really like a good RomCom! Also, something with a twist!
Do you have any viewing restrictions? Such as violence, language, explicit behavior, or drug use?
No. I'll be watching by myself so I don't have any problems with that.
Great! So do you like Romantic Comedies that focus on traditional relationships or ones that are somewhat more progressive?
Hum. Well, I like traditional but I'm open to anything really.
Perfect! And do you prefer an upbeat or dark style of comedy?
I like both actually!!
Ok! What type of mood or setting would you prefer?
Something in the Christmas spirit with upbeat and popular music would be awesome!

I have the perfect recommendation!

Last Christmas (2019)
https://www.imdb.com/title/tt8623904/

Last Christmas is a 2019 romantic comedy film directed by Paul Feig and written by Bryony Kimmings and Emma Thompson, who co-wrote the story with her husband, Greg Wise. Named after the 1984 song of the same name and inspired by the music of George Michael and Wham!, the film stars Emilia Clarke as a disillusioned Christmas store worker who forms a relationship with a mysterious man (Henry Golding) and begins to fall for him; Emma Thompson and Michelle Yeoh also star. How does that sound?
OMG! That is PERFECT!! Thank you!
I am glad to be of assistance! What about that suggestion did you find so appealing?
I really like a few of those actors and I also love that soundtrack! Plus I'm a sucker for Christmas comedies. Thank you so much!
So glad I could help! If you need any more assistance, please don't hesitate to ask. Merry Christmas!
You too!
Hey! I'm back!
Great! Are you looking for another movie recommendation?
Heck yeah, I am! I loved that last movie you suggested!
Haha! Awesome! Anything in particular? Theme, actors, genre, or directors?
Yes! Something with that Emily girl in it again
Got it! Something with Emily Clark. Were you looking for a particular style or theme?
Not really. Something that is long though. I have a long flight that I'd like to watch it on.
Yes of course! Are you flying alone? Do you have any restrictions?
No restriction and yes, I'm flying alone! I have the whole row to myself lol!

I have found a romantic drama
https://www.imdb.com/title/tt2674426/

Me Before You (2016) 
Romance drama film directed by Thea Sharrock in her directorial debut and adapted by author Jojo Moyes from her 2012 novel of the same name. The film stars Emilia Clarke, Sam Claflin, Janet McTeer, Charles Dance and Brendan Coyle.

How does that sound?
Oh this looks great! Thank you!
So glad I could help! What about this recommendation do you like so much?
The plot looks greatand a little different than what I normally watch. I am very excited for this!
I really appreciate that and I hope you enjoy the movie! If there is anything else, please let me know!
Nothing for now. Thanks again!

frequently_watched: different than what I normally watch

dialogue.message: I need another recommendation!
Of course! What are you looking for?
Well, I want a cool movie I can take over to a girls house for a date night. Something funny and romantic!
Of course! Do you or your date like anything in particular? Such as actors or themes?
Nothing really comes to mind except she did say she likes Justin Timberlake one time.
Ok! Any other actors?
I know she like SNL and Family Guy. I can't think of the actors though.

No problem at all. I think I have the perfect movie.

Friends with Benefits (2011)
https://www.imdb.com/title/tt1632708/

An American romantic comedy film directed by Will Gluck and starring Justin Timberlake and Mila Kunis. The film features Patricia Clarkson, Jenna Elfman, Bryan Greenberg, Nolan Gould, Richard Jenkins, and Woody Harrelson in supporting roles.[3] The plot revolves around Dylan Harper (Timberlake) and Jamie Rellis (Kunis), who meet in New York City, and naively believe adding sex to their friendship will not lead to complications. Over time, they begin to develop deep feelings for each other, only to deny it each time they are together. How does that look?
This is great!!!
Is there anything more that you would like to see? Was the suggestion something that will work or would you like to keep searching?
No, this was great! I know she will love it!
Once again, thank you so much and I really hope you enjoy your date! Take care!
Thanks again!
Hello there! Allow me to be your personal movie advisor, recommending films you'll love.
hello i'm looking for a christmas movie to watch alone
is there any type of movie you dont like
i like all types but would like a romance
what are your fave genres and do you usually watch alone
I enjoy romance & romantic comedy's. And I usually watch alone
Are you looking for a newer release
I dont mind when it was released just that its set at Christmas
On what streaming sites will you be watching the movie?
I have Amazon Prime Video, Netflix and Disney+

Because you like Romantic Christmas Movies and have Amazon Prime Video. I recommend Meeting Mr Christmas https://www.amazon.co.uk/gp/video/detail/B0B6DR396B/ref=atv_dp_amz_c_TS5124c5_1_4?jic=16%7CCgNhbGwSA2FsbA%3D%3D
Thank you that sounds perfect, as its set at Christmas and I have Amazon Prime
Is there anything in particular that intrests you with this movie
The fact its set at Christmas and i've never seen this movie
Thank you i'm glad I could help. Hope you enjoy watching
Thank you for your help
hello i'm looking for another movie with the same actor or actress as my previous movie
Could you please tell me the names of the actors & why you liked their performance
They were very believable,  The names are Madison Smith and Greta Carew-Johns
Would you like to stick with a Romance or watch another genre
I dont mind another genre mystery, drama etc
Madison Smith was in a show called the Garage Sale Mysteries which I think you'd enjoy.  Its on Amazon Prime Video and is rated 4 stars
That show looks good, a nice hallmark cozy mystery
I'm pleased you like my suggestion, thank you and goodbye
thank you for your help
Hi i'm looking for a movie to watch with children while on a car journey
What streaming service will you have access to and how old are the children
The Children are 5 and 8 and will be watching on Amazon prime
Do you want animated or live action and do the Children have any fave actors/directors?
They love Jim Carrey, James Corden and Disney
As they like Jim Carrey, The Grinch is on Amazon Prime Video and has good ratings https://www.amazon.co.uk/gp/video/detail/B07L6RXXCT/ref=atv_mv_hom_c_WHfJvG_brws_27_3?jic=8%7CEgRzdm9k
That sounds a perfect family movie
Why do you think its perfect is there anything specific you like
Its U rated so family friendly, and I love the message about the spirit of Christmas
Thank you and enjoy the movie
Thank you for your help
Hello there! Allow me to be your personal movie advisor, recommending films you'll love.
I`m thinking of what movie to watch with family No content restrictions
What are your preferred movie genres when watching with family?
Action Adventure, Sci-fi or Fantasy
What platform are you using?  What time period would you like the movie from?
I am using Amazon Prime Video.  Any time period.
Here are some recommendations for sci-fi movies from Amazon.  You can check out the link at:  https://ew.com/movies/best-sci-fi-movies-on-amazon-prime/
This is great.  How about action adventure titles?
Sure!  Here are some recommendtions for action adventure movies from Amazon.  You can check out the link at: https://www.vulture.com/article/best-action-movies-amazon-prime.html
Cool.  How about fantasy titles?

Sure! Here are some recommendtions for sci-fi movies from Amazon. You can check out the link at:https://www.cnet.com/culture/entertainment/the-best-fantasy-movies-on-prime-video-you-can-watch-right-now/
Ok.  I chose the Tomorrow War.  Can you recommend any other movies with Chris Pratt?
Hi there.  Need another recommendation.
What would you like?
Another movie recommendation with Chris Pratt.

Here is a list of movies and TV shows with Chris Pratt on Amazon Prime:
https://www.amazon.com/Chris-Pratt-Prime-Video-Movies-TV/s?k=Chris+Pratt&rh=n%3A2858778011
Which one is action adventure?
The best rated action themed TV show is:  The Terminal List
Ok.  Anything else?
Will you be watching alone?
Yes

Continuing with action adventure, the next best rated movie is:  Passengers.  It`s about a spacecraft traveling to a distant colony planet and transporting thousands of people has a malfunction in its sleep chambers. As a result, two passengers are awakened 90 years early.  You can find more indepth information at:  https://www.imdb.com/title/tt1355644/
Ok. Give me a choice if I were to watch with family.

For family, a great rated movie is:  Take Me Home Tonight. It's the late 1980s, when Wall Street is riding high, and it seems as if the entire country is cashing in on the bumper profits. Disgusted with the materialism that surrounds him, Matt Franklin, a brilliant young MIT graduate, has walked out on his well-paid position at a local lab and taken a low-level job as a video clerk.  A charming comedy.
Anything for kids?
What ages?

Family time!  The best family with kids oriented movie is:  Jurassic World which is PG-13.  The movie is about the genetically spawned dinosaurs of 'Jurassic World' escape and wreak havoc on the park's terrified visitors in this blockbuster sequel.  You can find more information at:  https://www.imdb.com/title/tt0369610/
Ok.  Thanks.
Hello
Hey there!  What can I help you with today?
I want a few movie options for me and my girlfriend.   Something with romance and comedy.  Netflix please.
Any restrictions? What time periods?
No restrictions.  Any time period.
Do you want young actors/actresses or more mature?
Any age group is fine
Here is a list of top rated romantic comedies on Netflix right now:  https://ew.com/movies/best-romantic-comedies-netflix/
All look good.  Tell me more about the top rated.

A top rated movie is: 
 Along for the Ride. It`s about the summer before college Auden meets the mysterious Eli, a fellow insomniac. While the seaside town of Colby sleeps, the two embark on a nightly quest to help Auden experience the fun, carefree teen life she never knew she wanted.
 You can find more information at: 
 https://www.imdb.com/title/tt14506528/
Anything with an older cast?

Always Be My Maybe is a popular choice.  It`s about the summer before college Auden meets the mysterious Eli, a fellow insomniac. While the seaside town of Colby sleeps, the two embark on a nightly quest to help Auden experience the fun, carefree teen life she never knew she wanted.  You can find out more details at:  https://www.imdb.com/title/tt7374948/
Ok.  I like that choice.  Any others?

The Incredible Jessica James.  It`s about an aspiring playwright in New York strikes up a friendship with a guy while on the rebound from a break-up.  You can find out more details at:  https://www.imdb.com/title/tt5990342/
Sounds like good choices.  Anything from Amazon Prime?\
Hello there! Allow me to be your personal movie advisor, recommending films you'll love.
hello thanks for the help
You're welcome, do you have an idea of what kind of movie you would like, or who you plan to watch the movie with
yes, i need something family friendly  and a comedy is preferred, we are watching at home
Ok family friendly, so nothing over a P-13 or only rated G movies?
yes only G rated, I don't want any profanity or nudity
Ok would you like a movie about the whole family or a hero's tale, or an underdog story?
i would like a christmas movie about the whole family
would you like a classic christmas movie or more modern? would you like a movie with a traditional snowy christmas or a southern christmas
yes a southern christmas,  with a mainly black cast

https://www.imdb.com/title/tt0937375/

This movie is called "This Christmas" from 2007 it is highly rated and considered a classic black christmas movie. is this a good choice for you?
yes that is a great movie that my children have'nt seen yet
is this movie very relatable to you
yes i am black and im going to watch it with my black family in the south. thanks for your help i am done now
you are welcome, i am always here to help
sure

cultural_preferences_like: relatable to black family in the south

dialogue.message: Hello there! Allow me to be your personal movie advisor, recommending films you'll love.
HI, I am searching for a horror film that is suitable to watch with a friend.
Okay, Great. Do you have any restrictions on the preference movie genre?
NO, I don't have any restrictions. I am wanting something really scary.
Will you be watching this movie alone or with a friend? what are some of you r favorite movie genres?
I will be watching the movie with a friend. My favorite movie genres are horror and romance.
To ensure that the movie is suitable for both you and your friend, what is your friends favorite movie genre?
My friends like comedy and horror films.

Beetle Juice 2 would be a good recommendation to watch with a friend considering that It is a horror-comedy film that also includes romance. What do you think of this film? https://www.imdb.com/title/tt2049403/?ref_=sr_t_9
I like this recommendation. I think it has the perfect genre balance of what I am looking for.
What exactly appeals to about this recommendation?
It is the genre balance this recommendation would be something both me and my friend will enjoy watching.
I am glad I could assist you with finding the right movie for you and your friend to enjoy. It has been a pleasure. I'm here if there is anything else you need. Have a great day.
Thank you.
Do you have any favorite actors and directors in horror and romance films? If so why do you enjoy their work?
Yes. I love Tim Burton's work. I think he does a sensational job.
Hi, I would like to explore another movie by the same director.
Do you have any specific directors or actors you enjoy? are there any you avoid?
I love Tim Burton's work. I don't avoid any directors or actors at the moment.

Corpse Bride is film directed by Tim Burton. This film includes horror as well as romance.I think it will be a good recommendation for what you are looking for. You can find more information on the film here. https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Corpse_Bride
Yes, I am definitely interesting in this film.
Is there anything specific you enjoy about Tim Burton's work such as the theme, genre etc?
Yes, I enjoy that Tim Burton incorporates creepy, mystery films with comedy and romance.
I am happy I could assist you in finding the right recommendations for you. If you need anything else I am here to help. Have a great day.
done
Hi, I am looking for a film that is suitable to watch with my kids.
To understand your preference better, what are the age groups of your kids?
My kids are ages 6 and 9.

I recommending checking out Haunted Mansion. This films offers a family-friendly genre. It is similar to the style of Tim Burton's films. This is a film is appropriate and suitable for the ages your kids while provided the movie genres that you enjoy. https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Haunted_Mansion_(2023_film)
Yes, I think me and my kids will find this film to be enjoyable.
Is there anything in particular that appeals to you about Haunted Mansion? Do you have any concerns about the film?
Yes, I like that this is a fairly new film that is horror based as well as family-friendly. I don't have any concerns about this film at the moment.
Hello there! Allow me to be your personal movie advisor, recommending films you'll love.
Excellent, do you have any recommendations for a thrilling action movie that is pretty new?
Do you have any content that you wish to avoid?
no anything is fine.
What genres are you interested in? Maybe a certain setting you are interested in?
Action and adventure in space
How would you like to watch it? What platforms are available to you?
I have netflix and Hulu
What is you mood right now? Are there any directors or actors you would like to see?
I'm feeling energetic, anyone is fine.

A thrilling space movie that is new that I can recommend is 65. https://www.netflix.com/title/81520516?source=35. I think you'll enjoy the planetary crash and burn flick. It fits all your specifications. What do you think?
I think that one looks good thank you.
What about this movie intrigues you? Thank you for all your responses and I am happy to help.
I like the actor Adam Driver.
Thank you for your guidance and I think you made a great choice with Adam Driver.
no problem, thank you.
Hello assistant, I'm looking for a movie recommendation.
Do you have any settings or genres you are interested in?
I'd like a comedy, something newer.
Is there any occasion or theme you'd like to see?
No anything will do.
Do you have any regional or cultural preferences?
none thank you
I think you'll enjoy this raucous comedy featuring an animated cast. https://www.netflix.com/title/80098100. What do you think?
That looks funny. I like Danny Mcbride.
What about Danny Mcbride do you enjoy? Do you like animation?
I like his bravado. I thin animation is okay, I don't usually pick it but I will try this one.
I think you'll enjoy this one and I thank you for your time and allowing me to serve you better.
Thanks!
Hello assistant! Do you want to help me find another movie?
Absolutely! Do you have any desires while at home or traveling for movie preferences?
I'm relaxing at home, I'm in the mood for something real life.
Do you have a preference for classic or modern films?
I'd like something modern.
I can recommend a movie featuring one of you favorite actors. https://www.netflix.com/title/80996851?source=35. BlacKkKlansman is a thrilling real life detective film starring Adam Driver.
I've seen that one before.
I can also recommend a thrilling film that takes place on the race course. https://www.netflix.com/title/81672085. Gran Turismo is recently released and is a white knuckle thrill ride.
I like that one. I'll give it  a try.
That sounds good, what about this film is compelling to you?
I like cars a lot.
I think you've picked a great movie. I thank you for allowing me to help you find what you need.
thanks
Hello there! Allow me to be your personal movie advisor, recommending films you'll love.
Hello! I am not sure what movie I should watch alone.
What are your favourite movie genres? Is there any specific content you would like to avoid?
I quite like deep psychological movies which make me think for a few days after. I would like to avoid too unrealistic scenarios.
Just to confirm, this is the movie you are planning on watching alone, right?
Yes, just me, alone at home.
What is your current mood like? Are there any specific actors or directors you enjoy watching in deep psychological movies?
I am feeling quite anti-social a the moment, so this is the perfect type of movie for me. I enjoy watching Tarkovsky movies.

I think I have got a perfect movie suggestion for you: it is by Tarkovsky, suits your current anti-social mood, will definitely provoke a lot of thinking and will not contain unrealistic scenarios. 
Here is the URL for the movie Mirror by Tarkovsky: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NrMINC5xjMs  
This is the ideal movie for your current request. You will not regret watching it. 
Please, let me know what you think, whether this movie is suitable for you to watch alone and whether it suits your mood.
Oh wow! I love your recommendation! This movie will have me thinking for days after. It suits my mood perfectly. I cannot wait to watch it tonight. Thank you!
I am so happy you like it! What excites you specifically about this movie The Mirror?
It looks and sounds so deep and thought-provoking, just what I wanted to discover.
Brilliant! Thank you for explaining. I am really excited about you liking my recommendation. Have a lovely evening! Enjoy your movie and alone time!
Thank you! Goodbye and thanks for the movie again!
Hello again! I would like to explore another movie by the same director.
Hello! Glad to see you again! I understand you would like to explore another movie by Tarkovsky. Is there any specific request for it? Would you like to watch it at home or on the go?
No specific request here. I would like it to be as deep as the previous one, and I would watch it while flying on the plane.

Do you normally watch deep psychological movies and what is the reason for it? How is your current mood? Will you be watching the movie alone or with someone else? What are your available streaming platforms?

Yes, I only watch these kinds of movies. I like to think more than others. My mood is stable, balanced and neutral. I will be watching the movie alone on the plane. Youtube is my preferred streaming platform.

In this case, I would like to recommend another movie Stalker by Tarkovsky, which will also make you think deeply for days, and does not have unrealistic scenarios. It is available on Youtube, so would be perfect for you to watch on the plane. Here is the link:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Q3hBLv-HLEc
Oh, that sounds like another great psychological movie, and the length of it is just right for my flight.
Lovely! Please, let me know why you find the movie Stalker appealing. Are there any specific elements you are looking for in the movie?
It looks so real and weird, but at the same time very intriguing. This is what I normally look for in the movie.
Thank you for your feedback, it is super helpful for me. Happy to hear you are interested in watching Stalker. Have a safe flight!
No worries, thank you for helping me out once again. Thank you! Bye!
Hi there! I would like another movie recommendation for watching with my husband on a date night.
Hello again! Is there any specific type of movie you are looking for to watch on your date night? And what movies does your husband prefer?
My husband is a big thinker also, so we like our psychological movies even on our date nights.
Is there a special occasion for the date night? What are your husband's favourite psychological movies?
No, just a regular Wednesday date night we have every week. My husband would watch anything, as long as we enjoy it together.

I believe, another psychological movie by Tarkovsky would suit both of your preferences. 
You can watch the movie The Sacrifice via this link: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZzVkwyJIL88  
It looks like a very good movie choice for the couple to watch together. Please, let me know if you agree or not, and why.
Hm, I am not entirely sure about this one, as my husband might not like the scenario. Is there another movie you could suggest for us?

I think the movie Solaris would be a great substitute. It is full of philosophical questions and emotional dilemmas, which you and your husband would enjoy talking over after. 
Here is the link for the movie: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LutMHAeCfLU&list=PLrrKbHPKjy_O7W-hdStPc2WcHIv_F0EJu 
Please, let me know if this movie suits your date night better.
This looks amazing! And my husband would definitely enjoy it as much as me.
What would you and your husband like about the movie Solaris? Is there something specific, which appeals to both of you?
It looks so mysterious, and we both love solving mysterious puzzles.
Thanks a lot for your feedback. Glad to hear you will enjoy the movie Solaris on your special night. Have a great evening!
Thank you for another great recommendation! Goodbye!
Hello there! Allow me to be your personal movie advisor, recommending films you'll love.
Hi, Thanks so much. I'm trying to determine what movie to watch tonight by myself at home. I like dramas movies.
Do you have content restrictions or specific themes you prefer to avoid in movies?
No I'm open to any themes and content.
What is your preferred movie genre and what movies have you enjoyed in past?
I like drama movies that have lots of action. For example I liked Batman.
Will you be watching the movie alone tonight? What other action dramas did you enjoy?
I'll be watching alone. I also liked Avatar and Spiderman movies.
Do you have any favourite actors / actresses? And how are you feeling tonight with your mood?
I like Brad Pitt a lot. I'm feeling relaxed tonight.

I recommend you watch Avatar: The Way of Water tonight.
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Avatar:_The_Way_of_Water

It's another film in the Avatar franchise you enjoy.
It's highly rated and an engaging drama with action.

Can you please provide your feedback on my recommendation.
Excellent recommendation.
What specific elements of the movie did you most enjoy?
I loved the storyline and boatful visuals.
Thank you very much for your feedback. I'm glad you enjoyed the movie and hope you enjoy the remainder of your evening.
Thank you. You too.

content_restrictions: open to any themes and content

dialogue.message: Hello there! Allow me to be your personal movie advisor, recommending films you'll love.
I don't know what to watch tonight
Will you be alone or with someone else?
It's just me and my girlfriend
What was the last film or TV series you enjoyed together?
Game of Thrones, but it all got a bit dragony and too much emphasis on sex
Would you like something similar, or would something more romantic suit your mood tonight?
I think we need a good laugh to be honest
Who is your favourite comedy actor?
There haven't been any funny people on TV for about 15 years, they're all too forced and obvious. Jim Carrey was funny when I was a kid.

A popular movie starring Jim Carrey is "The Cable Guy"

https://www.imdb.com/title/tt0115798/

You may have already seen this one, but it could be worth watching again!
We've seen all his films. Something we missed in the 90's that is similar in style I think.

In terms of wacky humour from the era, I can recommend a film named 'Good Burger".

https://www.imdb.com/title/tt0119215/

It is similar in style and feeling to the Jim Carrey film 'Dumb & Dumber", for example, and should give the two of you something to laugh about this evening.
seen it

What about "Mallrats"?

https://www.imdb.com/title/tt0113749/
Never saw that one. But my girlfriend hates rats...are there any rats in it?
No rats! The title refers to teenagers who spend their time hanging around in shopping malls.
what's funny about that?

It's simply a setting for the escapades that the characters eventually get up to. The film launched the careers of many future comedy stars such as Jay & Silent Bob. In terms of comedy, this film has been referred to as 'genre-defining'.
is Jack Black in it?
We'll probably watch Mallrats then. I see the director also made Chasing Amy...someone once recommended that to me, is it any good?
This is also a comedy with romantic undertones from the era. Who recommended this to you? Did you share similar interests?
We were sleeping together. I told her about a German lesbian I fell in love with and she toldme I should watch this film. My current girlfriend might be uncomfortable watching this for those reasons!

Okay! Well we don't want to cause any undue stress on your current relationship! For 90's comedies, I can also recommend "Mrs. Doubtfire".

https://www.imdb.com/title/tt0107614/?ref_=fn_al_tt_1
that seems a bit random...we've seen it anyway

Perhaps you haven't seen "Happy Gilmore"?

https://www.imdb.com/title/tt0116483/

The blurb reads - "A rejected hockey player puts his skills to the golf course to save his grandmother's house."

Stars Adam Sandler.
We quite like Adam Sandler, but we've seen that one.

"Billy Madison" is a popular one from 1995.

https://www.imdb.com/title/tt0112508/
Neither of us saw that one, it's got the kind of title you instantly forget about. Is it as good as Big Daddy?
The lead role is quite different, in Billy Madison the protagonist has to go back to school to repeat all his grades, which is quite fun to see. What in particular did you like about "Big Daddy"?
Oh I can't even remember really, just that it was good and I felt more alive in 1999! We'll probably watch Big Daddy as well as Billy Madison.
